etymology.description: 星(星) (xīng, "star") + 巴(巴) (bā, "area; wish") + 克(克) (kè, "to overcome; gram")
etymology.interpretation: 星巴克 (Xīngbākè) is a phonetic transcription of the name Starbucks, the international coffee company. The components 星(星) (xīng, "star"), 巴(巴) (bā, "area; wish"), and 克(克) (kè, "to overcome; gram") are selected to approximate the sound of 'Starbucks' rather than to convey a specific meaningful translation.

examples.chinese: 我今天去星巴克(我今天去星巴克)，尝试新品(嘗試新品)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān qù Xīngbākè, chángshì xīn pǐn.
examples.english: Today I went to Starbucks and tried new products.

examples.chinese: 星巴克是我最喜欢的聚会场所(星巴克是我最喜歡的聚會場所)。
examples.pinyin: Xīngbākè shì wǒ zuì xǐhuān de jùhuì chǎngsuǒ.
examples.english: Starbucks is my favorite venue for gatherings.

examples.chinese: 晚上我在星巴克(晚上我在星巴克)，坐下来写作业(坐下來寫作業)。
examples.pinyin: Wǎnshàng wǒ zài Xīngbākè, zuò xiàlái xiě zuòyè.
examples.english: At night, I sat down at Starbucks to do my homework.
